p.d: Actress, circus artist, dancer, musician multi-instrumentalist, the hyper-active French singer-songwriter AloIse Sauvage goes for it. On her first EP "Jimy", she offers five songs that question the love stories of a generation without taboo, an album presented in the form of a personal diary, cheerfully mixing song, hip-hop and electro. Presented by: SÃ©bastien Folin; directed by: Philippe Sommet.
